auth.usernameNotAvailableWithSuggestions: This username is already taken. You can try: {suggestions}

auth.usernameReserved: This username is reserved and cannot be used
auth.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, and underscores
auth.usernameInvalidDot: Username cannot start or end with a dot

invalid.email: Please enter a valid email address

invalid.passwordComplexity: Password must contain both letters and numbers

complete.title: Complete Registration

virtualEmail.label: AI Email Username
virtualEmail.info: This AI email address is used to intelligently process your information. It's your unique identifier in the Threadline intelligent processing system.

scene.label: Usage Scenario
scene.help: Select your primary use case. The system will optimize AI prompt configurations based on your selection

google.completeSubtitle: Please fill in the information below to complete your account setup

chats.title: Chats
chats.noChatsDesc: No chats have been processed yet.
chats.noConversationsDesc: When you receive emails, they will appear here.
chats.searchPlaceholderDetailed: Search titles, content, tags... Supports multiple keywords
chats.processedContentDesc: This section will show organized conversation notes when available

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.desc: Add key milestones, format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm (24-hour format, precise to the minute). Example: "2025-10-30 14:30"

keywords.title: Tags
keywords.desc: Custom tags for search (e.g., High priority/External/Discussion)

settings.title: Settings
settings.emailAddressDesc: Forward once, AI handles it all · Text & image recognition
settings.languageDesc: Specifies the language used by AI when generating summaries, titles, and metadata.
settings.sceneDesc: Select the scene mode used by AI when processing chats. Different scenes use different processing methods and prompt templates.
settings.preferenceChangeWarning: Note: Changing this setting will affect the output language for AI summaries, tags, and metadata in future chat processing. Scene switching affects AI processing methods and prompt templates. The new setting will take effect on the next chat processed.
settings.passwordResetConfirmDesc: We will send a password reset link to your security email. Please confirm the email address is correct:
settings.passwordResetEmailSentDesc: Please check your security email and click the link to complete password reset
settings.passwordResetError: Failed to send password reset email
settings.loginEmailDesc: Your exclusive AI email for login and receiving messages for AI intelligent processing
settings.securityEmailDesc: Used for password reset and security verification
settings.oauthPasswordChangeInfo: OAuth users cannot change passwords. Please use your OAuth provider to manage your account.

reset.title: Reset Password
reset.subtitle: Enter your new password below
reset.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
reset.passwordRequirements: Password must contain both letters and numbers
reset.unknownError: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
reset.successMessage: Your password has been reset. You can now login with your new password.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource

retry.languageHint: Select the language for AI processing (leave empty to use default)
retry.sceneHint: Select the scene mode for AI processing (leave empty to use default)
retry.forceModeHint: Force retry will re-process OCR and LLM even if results already exist
retry.forceModeWarning: Force retry will clear all previously generated records, re-identify images and perform intelligent summarization.
retry.retryError: Failed to trigger retry, please try again

currentSubscription.freePlanDesc: Free Plan - Upgrade for more features

plans.title: Subscription Plans

plans.cancelSuccess: Subscription canceled. Will take effect at the end of current period.

plans.resumeFailed: Failed to resume subscription, please try again

downgrade.title: Downgrade Subscription
downgrade.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to downgrade to {plan}?
downgrade.effectiveNote: Note: The downgrade will take effect at the end of the current billing period. Until then, you can continue using all features of your current plan.
downgrade.availableUntil: You can continue using your current plan until {date}
downgrade.success: Downgrade scheduled. Will take effect at the end of current period.
downgrade.failed: Failed to schedule downgrade, please try again

cancel.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You can continue using until the end of current period.
cancel.effectiveNote: Note: Cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing period. You can still use the service until then.

resume.title: Resume Subscription
resume.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to resume your subscription?
resume.effectiveNote: After resuming, your subscription will auto-renew at the end of current period.

creditUsage.title: Credit Usage by Chats
creditUsage.noData: No credit usage found in this period

creditsInfo.title: About Credits
creditsInfo.description: Each credit allows you to process one chat with all its features

messages.paymentSuccess: Payment successful! Your subscription is now active.
messages.cancelSuccess: Subscription canceled. Will take effect at the end of current period.
messages.downgradeSuccess: Downgrade scheduled. Will take effect at the end of current period.
messages.resumeSuccess: Subscription resumed. Auto-renewal is now active.
